titleStmt.title: Virginalia. or Spirituall sonnets in prayse of the most glorious Virgin Marie vpon euerie seuerall title of her litanies of Loreto: all or most part of the principall passages therein confirmed by the euident testimonies of the ancient fathers, to preuent the obiections of such, as vsually detract from her deserued prayses. By I.B.
titleStmt.author: I. B., fl. 1632.
Anderton, Lawrence, attributed name.
Anderton, James, fl. 1624, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed with licence [by the widow of N. Courant],

notesStmt.note: I.B. has been identified as John Brereley, who has been identified as both James Anderton and Lawrence Anderton; but the attribution is probably incorrect. See "Recusant history" XVI (1982), p. 17-41.
Identified as STC 3539 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
